content: Geofencing doesn't work anymore. App doesn't recognize I'm home or away until I open it.
Excellent app with great features. Installation went smoothly!
Horrible support
In the current version the app is always considering that I'm not at home and turn off the air condition
Geofencing used to work but now it doesn't and the app kept crashing.

Great, but, my device (IVT Heatpump) has a button on the controller that is not supported, any chance to get it included? It's a button activating the Ionizator to clean the air. Thanks. EDIT: Well that was some fantastic customer service!!! I sent this review and a few emails later this feature is now enabled. Keep it up! Thanks so much.
The best support ever !! The best device !!
Works flawlessly, very accurate and very responsive, gives you total control on the AC unit that makes it very smart!

Great for scheduling times and temperatures to keep the room comfortable while saving money. The only drawback is that it seems to reset what it thinks the temperature is to the unit itself, instead of following the temperature at the remote, 20 feet away at the warm side of the room. So any time the schedule updates the unit, I have to toggle the Follow button on the remote again to get it to behave properly. If this can be added into the app, it would be 5 stars.
Beautiful and comfy app 🙂
Awesome app and good scheduling services. But if only there was a way it could sense the AC was already turned on.

I have had the sensors for 2 years - they have worked well, but the recent app update has made them both disconnect. I've spent hours trying to reset and reinstall them individually. I really hope Sensibo isn't trying to push old sensors off the system so people are forced to buy the upgraded version! Edit: help desk helped solve this issue!

Awesome device, and app so nearly perfect. But why can't you just set a target temperature (using the Sensibo device thermostat), and then hit auto? Sensibo could then tell A/C to heat/cool the room during scheduled hours as needed. Climate react isn't quite right, because say you cool from X degrees. You need to turn off the cooling when it's too cold. But you don't want to turn on heat at this point, only if it's even colder. This means in winter, it needs to be reconfigured.
Works well, having climate react interact with the geofencing feature is super convenient. Developers and support team are quick to respond to app issues too.

Don't buy these. While they work great, it's obvious the developers are going to extort money from you with features in the app on future releases. Not a good move dirt bags. I'll be trying the alternative devices made by other manufacturers from now on.
Works exactly as expected. I really like the recent app design update and customer service is quick and helpful. Highly recommended!

New updates on the app and suddenly things that I used to get as part of the product I bought is now on a 'plus' subscription. I bought a product and features are now taken away from me for the greed of money. I am honestly scared that soon even more features will only be available on the plus subscription. I used to recommend this to everyone and 9 people have bought because of me. I even was one of the first adopters of them when they crowd funded. Now I I can not recommend them to anyone.
I absolutely love my sensibo. It works great and easy to set up.
Just installed another unit. Piece of cake.

The internal function that's supposed to allow you to configure a Sky device's wifi settings is broken and doesn't work. After providing all the settings and attempting to save them to the device, what happens is the app "spins" for several minutes and then exits with an error "There was an error while configuring the Wi-Fi network of your Sensibo device. Please reset the device and try again. If the error persists, please contact support." The error DOES persist, no matter how many attempts you make. The only way to successfully configure the WiFi settings on a Sky device is to use its "access point" mode after using the reset button. However, the documented process on Sensibo's web site for accomplishing that is ALSO wrong and leaves out one critically important step: changing the device mode from "access point" to "station".
I cant even sign up without an error popping up. About to return the product.

Not much to use with the app or devices. They could do so much more if they wanted . Don't waste the money. Basic installation failed on 3 of four of the devices. I had to go through extra steps to set up the devices.
Waste of time (and money). Requires a monthly subscription to operate basic functions. Support is awefull.

The app is great but needs to be improved. the on/off by location isn't work like it was at the beginning, it doesn't recognize me auto unless i turning off/on the location, only after i do it recognize me next to my home & even so, sometimes it shows me my ac's turned on & while i entering my home i find that sometimes only one is on & the sec isn't. sometimes i find they're both off while the app shows they're on. the schedule needs an option for alternately times to be on/off too. pls add it

So far I'm not impressed. I can't even setup an account to use the dam thing. Tried 2 different email addresses and neither of them have received a confirmation email. Please help me sort this, then I might give a more positive feed back And yes I checked spam folder. ****UPDATE**** After contacting developers and sorting out initial problems, this device is wonderful. Easy to use, easy to setup on/off, temp etc. Well done Sensibo.
I couldn't turn the a.c off if it is on timer mode. I work fine before this update.

Overall the device worked great, except an annoying bug: My AC is turned on on climate react through the night, and once in awhile the Sensibo sends a command to turn on or off that is not detected by the AC. This is terrible and wakes me up at night I've switched positions of the Sensibo device times, and the problem still occurs. A simple logic for Sensibo that observes the temperature haven't changed and is still going up/down, and repeat the last command would've easily solved it

Perfection. This device is a must have gadget. It's much easier than figuring out the IR remote that came with my heatpump - it has made that remote redundant (except as a backup). I can control the heatpump and monitor room temperature from anywhere with internet access. And I can have more timers than my heatpump provides. I have good WiFi coverage and a power socket located below my high wall heatpump, so I have double-side taped the Sensibo to the power plug. Easy peasy. Supports Alexa too!

I have been using sensibo for more than 2 years and never had any issues with the device which was easy to install, another great thing is the Sensib curtomer service team readily assisting customers needs. Sensibo comes packed with many features I do enjoy mostly climate react.
Almost froze to death last night, because the device stuck again reading 108 degrees Celsius in the room and the climate react didn't work. Fix your app!!!
Better than what samsung puts out

Haven't had the chance to use the product. Because of this I have some suggestions, 1-Packaging should make it clear that you need the the aircon remote as I'm sure I'm not the only one who only bought this product because my remote has disappeared and bought this under the recommendation from the store as a replacement. 2- Your customer support is absolutely useless. 2 hours later and not even acknowledgement of my query. 3- info whether it can be set up without a remote or not on the website.
can't add a remote manually.. it keeps saying error.. there goes $200 down the drain
Great app. Love improvements

The device (or app?) will get stuck randomly to read 108(!!!) degrees Celsius, making any of the climate control features useless. Seems to be happen when i do heavy use of my internet (download a large file) but I am not 100% sure. Nothing fixes it, until i unplug/replug it from power. Overpriced device, can't even work properly. DON'T buy. Edit: I don't need support, you need to fix the app.
You have a 50/50 chance your Air Conditioner will be on when you get home. Good luck! Some quick action tiles for for climate react and Scheduling would be VERY useful.

I see I'm not the only one to have problems with sending commands to my AC failing too often and I'm not sure anymore my AC will be ON or OFF when need it. So probably it's not position of my Sensibo or line of sight because it's just next to my AC. You need to make faster server to handle all devices and user commands.
A lot of bugs and the support is bad. Not recommending at all. Buy something cheaper.
It's a great little app & does exactly what it's supposed to
This is the best! Thank you! I have two units and I never touch the remotes only use voice assistant or the app.

Edit: It now looks as it was supposed to be in the first place. Great job a bit shame for the plus features. If I bought the device I shouldn't pay extra for features in app. ______ Nice concept, poor execution. the temperature sensor is wildly inaccurate, the app is lacking and website is not mobile friendly. also been experiencing server outages lately..
Great scheduling and love the climate react setting, to keep the temperature just right.. Only issue is that climate react cannot be bound to certain times - for example when I am home.
Update: After the new update I now have no complaints. Dark mode has been integrated nice and smooth as requested all throughout the app. Thanks to the devs for making this happen so fast.
Great app. Redesign looks great. Dark mode is very useful.
I really like the latest update, thanks for the great job! I wrote a comment asking to add a dark mode and here it is! Thanks you for listening to your users, its priceless!
Love the new interface

The app is functional. It would be nice to have a timer on climate react so that it switches off after a time automatically. However my biggest complaint at the moment is that the app keeps crashing and isn't turning the AC off when I leave home. This wasn't an issue in earlier builds.
Excellent device, work perfectly !
Had my Sensibo for a year. Good updates to the app. Way better then the standard remote.
Does what it's supposed to.
Great idea, paywall is a scam. Used to be able to turn off climate react with geofencing. Now I need to turn it off manually or my AC will keep turning itself on while I'm away.

The update with climate react is really great. Please forward a request to development : add an option to schedule a power on command to the a/c and activate climate react. I want the a/c to power on in the morning when it gets hot and use climate react. Thanks :) Love your product Edit: This option apparently exists but you have to pay extra for it... How disappointing.

The app works as described! I have tested it with one and then proceeded to getting a second. But 5* come not only for doing quite well what it is supposed to do, but for the timely and polite responses I received from the producers with a minor notifications issue I encountered! Kudos guys, great support!

Latest update is quite buggy. AC loses state often and needs to be re-syncd. On/Off command doesn't work all the time. Sometimes accepts if pressed twice in quick succession. Backend commands for smart home integration also doesn't work seamlessly.
Works perfectly now thank you so much for all your help!
Setup was easy, it's sad that it doesn't have a widget for the home screen thought.

This app has come a long way and now includes all the functionality I'm looking for. Thank you to the Devs on the addition of the Climate React toggle to easily turn the rule on and off! That was my only remaining bugbear which is now fixed.

Absolute waste of money. Tried reconnecting after changing routers. Spent hours trying to no avail. Uninstalled and reinstalled app, reset device, changed account password nothing works. Avoid like the plague!
It was quick and easy to setup and has always worked. Just need to ensure the device has clear line of sight to the air con unit!
Brilliant
Awesome, turned my multi room spilt system from always searching for remotes to a real gem. Set wake up and shut down times. Turn off and on when away from home for the pets. Exceeds expectaions
Buying such expensive device and see some basics app feature costs extra, not ok.

My husband bought me sensibo sky, I very disappointed with this product. The app interface is poor you will need to PAY extra for plus plan otherwise will be stuck with basic functions that can be better provided for a fraction of the price with any smart IR controller.
Awesome

DONT support this company. I purchased multiple devices with the promise of geofencing and climate react scheduling. They've just updated the app and i now need to pay a monthly subscription to use these features. Edit: AI? Oh spare me, it's a glorified IR blaster with an app. If i wanted "AI" i would purchase an Ambi Climate. Oh look, they don't charge a monthly subscription!! Perhaps that's where i'll take my business. My issue is i purchased these devices for features you have now locked me out of unless i pay ~$50/year which means I'm basically paying for a new device every 3 years. Great job marketing team, give yourselves a round of applause.

I have 6 Sensibos around the house and lately they are randomly less responsive. New app does help, Sensibo supports seems unable to resolve this. Becomes quite annoying at times. Happy to reinstate 5 stars when fixed, as relibnly responsive as it used to be.
The app upgrade is awesome! Big improvement over the original. Love it.
Borked since v3. New UI is nice but there are many bugs. It was working very good before.

Love the design overhaul! Would be really awesome if you could set a schedule for when climate react runs. At night on those really hot days I don't care if it gets hotter throughout the house after I go to bed because I have a separate AC for the bedroom.

So far working great. Tech support even fixed my issue with temps being 1 degree off from actual on the remote. I subbed to Plus features but not seeing it being useful since there's only 1 climate react setting you can have at a time. If I could schedule different reacts at different parts of the day then it would be a no-brainer for me. But as it is I have to readjust the climate react multiple times a day to maintain my temps. Really wish for direct input instead of slider.

It works, kind of.. The SKY device works. Not a huge fan of the design. I had hoped the device itself plugged directly into the wall. Instead its got a separate plug and cable requiring me to mount sensor! The app..well it also works, kind of.. Beware! When you buy the product which promises a load of functions, many require you to pay a monthly licence fee! Basic functionality works to a point.. Although it would be nice if the scheduler would allow you to stop the device,not just start!

The latest update made the app look nicer but totally killed thy user experience. Took me a while to even figure out how to set an OFF timer! And the clock kept default to current time when I set the schedule which is annoying.
App shuts down with an error everytime i try to connect the device to my wifi. Paid all that money for the hardware but unable to use it
The updated app works much better. It would be helpful if you could see all heatpumps on a single page like it was before
Cannot setup in a new location and new wifi... Blank screen
Can't even get through the setup. When I get to the screen to choose a location, the screen goes completely blank. We bought two of these.
Love the device and the app. The only thing I'd like is the ability to control horizontal swing on my Panasonic split system AC. It can be done on the original remote.
New updated APP is awesome, love the sensibo and the new app just made it better.

Can't even set up the app, setup just gives blank screen at set location, total dissatisfaction. After some time 2 to 3 hours, managed to configure unit to control ac. You are only able to configure 1 climate react, so setting to heat below a temp. And cool above a set temp is not possible. Not very automated if you ask me, oh and if you think user instructions are easy think again, advert states control from echo unit, no instructions found yet.

Trying to add a new device, I named the room living room, then the app asked me to choose a location from the list or add new location, I clicked add new location, and showed an empty page, if I clicked the back button, it took me back to the initial page. Restarted the app and I can continue using the app.

Had to update my review which was bad before. Has a constantly changing and buggy user interface (sometimes features dont even work), As well as taking options that were originally free and making them pay to use. Wish I could still return my sensibo device.
One fault I found so far when I set heat to 21 ' c it passes that point and carry on till 24 and stop rather than control on 21 'c . Other than that awesome app after recent upgrades.
Great app and device. but latest update removed the option to see the history of events for more than the past 24 hours. I hope the app management bring it back in next update.
In set up it stalls and won't allow me to enter a location. Tried several times. This is why I bought it from job hifi store and not online so I'll just take it back.

Update: Thank you Sensibo for solving the issues with the GUI. The GUI is now proper size and looks slick, modern and feels more responsive somehow. Good job! Changing review score to 5* ------ Previous review: Latest update completely ruins the UX. It is no longer simple, everything is too small and difficult to read, overall just feels way to complex. I used to be very happy with this product and this update is ***extremely*** disappointing. At least give us the option to revert!
Any plans on introducing a widget? That would make 99% of my actions a lot simpler!
Very buggy. Sensibo sky is a nightmare to setup. Takes you 10 goes and a bit of luck for it to find it, add it and add to your wifi
Makes an older heatpump smart. I love it.
after today's upgrade: the on/off button is not responsive
Great redesign of the app!

New UI from Sensibo works reliably with sgs10+. Schedule works. Turns off/on even detecting ir remote turn on/off. Works as advertised. Works with Google assistant on Fujitsu, Mitsubishi Heavy Industries n Samsung split system.
Thank you! Now the app is great again!

The basic idea is to use also date in order to define when to activate and deactivate the air conditioner. Why you don't implement this? Only days is not easy. If I want specific day will be x and same day in next week will be y I cant do it!!!
יעיל ונוח, שירות לקוחות טוב מאוד ועיצוב נהדר
Since upgrade, doesn't work. I upgraded the app today and it thinks it's working, but nothing happens.
I don't like the new app at all. I find connecting via Chrome Browser more friendly. Also, why not display the "feels like" temperature?
Working well again

New app sucks! So many bugs. Why take something good and then ruin it for the sake of change? The monthly subscription thing is just rude... I wouldn't have bought a sensibo if they had a subscription at the time of purchase but they have added it later.
For the most part its a good application, specially since the update.
Showing blank screen in S9 even after new installation. Zero stars do not buy this product.

After the most recent update my climate react settings screen is blank and I cannot change the settings any other way. Can you please release a patch to fix this? Edit. Reported the problem on the app 3 days ago still not fixed.
Liking the updated app especially the 24 hour chart of temperature and humidity.

The app just gives me a blank screen on mobile for climate react if it wasn't already set up. Otherwise it works well. I took off two stars because of the undisclosed monthly fee pay wall in front of half the features. It's not OK to hide that a bunch of the features only work with a subscription. It isn't in the product features, description, or anywhere in the website. I wouldn't have bought mine if I knew about that. Is hiding that even legal?
The app and product are working great! And the app redesign is beautiful
Nice easy app. Well done. New interface looks fantastic!!

Love both my sensibos. The app is great and the new look also great. One less star for non-integrated schedule and climate react. You can have one or the other which isn't ideal. I would love to be able to schedule on and off times where the units use climate react when on and remain off when off. Automating this functionality would make Sensibo an actual perfect product. Having climate react on 24/7 is not ideal or energy efficient.
Changing a basic feature that was free to a paid subscription one is a big disappointment !!!

Some nice features,but as others have said white background is a big no no for me also needs much clearer on off features bigger colour changing button.Everything is far to small,simple and bold is what I would like

Paid about 100 dollars for a smart home device. New climareact scheduling feature gets released - awesome, but you need subscription to use it? This is dishonest - subscription is no where on the box. I'm looking into returning the units to Amazon for a refund, and will do all I can to let my friends and family know about dishonest businesses on my social media.
App just changed to something that looks like a desktop site. Shocking!!!
You updated the application great..... Like the looks But why do i have to pay to view a graph or to know when i have to clean the filters? The subscription feature is NOT COOL!
Liking the new app and the added functionality - timers, graphs etc. Keep up the good work.

Liking the new app design! Finally have the graphs and log in the app! The new paid "Plus" thing is a bit disappointing but at least its only for features that the app didn't have before. $2.99/month is a bit steep considering the cost of these devices to start with. My justification of the up front cost that "you're paying up front for what would usually be a subscription" is a bit harder to sell now. As long as you dont lock other existing features under the pay wall, all is good in my eyes.

Ever since new update the app is unusable...crashes if I can get it open, uninstalled and now won't reinstall...thanks to the 3 stooges developer team at sensibo for rendering the hardware useless. Can still get alexa to control things but otherwise this is no longer a useful product
Nice UPDATE, but please set the dark mode for the app !!!
Lost ability to view events history on sensibo classic device.
App was working well. Since the change yesterday I can't turn the temperature up at all.

Love the new design! Great job of redesigning the user interface. I really hated the old design with the unlabeled icons that were difficult to understand. New design fixes that and makes functions clear and more accessible.
Good app but i wish the set up will be easier, plus i hope black theme will come to this app,
What the hell happened to the UI in the latest update? Why is everything so small and the entire UI occupies 10% of the screen? Update: Fixed by changing phone resolution
After problematic login, app is petty much the same. Don't update if everything is working
New design looks great. It has everything I asked for. Keep it up!
Awesome thank you guys!!
Doesn't connect to the aircon well

Congratulation for changing to material design. Somebody is going to like it, somebody will hate it. One bug - the whole button of the enabling and disabling the AC should be clickable, currently only the bottom part works.
Update fail! App was great untill today's update, where it disappeared from my home screen on my phone, and I'm logged out. Anyone know my password?!

Edit: Had a lot of issues with the app becoming unresponsive when trying to log in, but it has suddenly started working. Inside the app - lots of great changes. The UI is much more clear, and there's a new toggle to enable and disable Climate React, which is something we've wanted for ages! Also I love the new temp/humidity graph.
Frustrated as with this update
Filter cleaning reminders are no longer free on the latest update. i will no longer recommend this product.
Think twice b4 even buying the hardware Not worth it as they start paid services for basic features...boo
Works for a day and then quits every time.
Thanks for wrecking what was a simple interface and over complicating it with your latest version.

Instead of adding new basic functionality, moving previously free features behind a brand new subscription service is a great way to earn 1 star ratings on the play store. Well done. Two years ago, I wrote support about basic X-Fan support for my AC. The answer was: "it is expected in the upcoming months". Two years later, we got a subscription service.
Now it works fine after many issues. Thx
App is working in most options, but some are not operating, for example, support function or reminder for filter exchange which generates errors
Works great
Great app, I would like to long press on the app to turn on/off of the AC without need to enter the app. It will be efficient
Love it. Works perfectly.

Nice app but they claim that you can save money by using their products. It worths a bundle of money and within two years it stopped working properly. They immediately recommended replacing for their newer model without giving effort to solve the prblem. If you want to start your AC remotely, go to the Chinese cheap products. They cost a fraction of the price and I'm sure you'll find what you need without losing your money. In my case, this braded name didn't do me any good.
Used to work quite well but recently has lots of connection issues 😒.
works as intended
Great control of multiple vendor units. Will be good when the mobile app gets the extended controls possible in the web apo

I am fairly happy with this device and app it allows control with Google home. But the Climate React feature is proving to be unreliable as it constantly loses settings and when I've set it to turn off at 22 degrees it seems to default to 30 by itself all the time and the A/C does not turn off. If you do not fix this issue I may as well just use the A/C's remote control :(

(Original review) Scheduled changes aren't working. Maybe 50% of the time. Updated: After many days of wondering if my scheduled changes were actually working I was able to chat with Lily who gave me a fix(seems obvious now). Simply drag down to refresh the app like you would to refresh your web browser(android). I didn't realize you could do this because I was clicking the notification and getting false readings which didn't seem correct and it wasn't, but a simple fix. Thank you Lily.

Does what it's supposed too. Good customer support. First unit connected perfectly. I stuffed up the second installation and the online support guided me through the process to cancel an incorrect registration and relink the unit to the correct email account. Very helpful and patient.

When I scan the qr code to setup my sensibo sky, it tells me; "Cannot scan device that has an associated user. Use the app the share your device with others." How do I fix this please!? Edit....I asked previous owner to deregister the device which still linked to his account. Now it works like a charm.
Seems to work well. App isn't the flashiest thing to look at but I mainly use my controller's with Google Assistant anyway which works well 99% of the time lol.

Just be careful when getting this product. There appears to be 2 versions. I went to office works and bought one which appears to be the same product as the other version. I had the couldn't connect to network error. Wasted 4 hours on this. And then I took it back to office works. They replaced it with one that has a different box. The product is identical and that version worked. Make sure it says sensibo core sky V2 on it. The other one doesn't work.
App is reliable and easy to sync with sensibo unit.

The app and controller work ok. But I have been expecting more. I have a rental property, and I would like to managed usage more intelligently than the app provides. Also, it does not support all of the features of AC model I have, and despite promises to add them, months later, no improvements. The integration with amazon echo is poor. Seems to me they are abandoning this platform.
Fiddly set up but ok once you get it going ok. Good to check out youtube video on the setup
I wish if we get widget for Android phones only start and stop home air-conditions In getting its the best gadget in this year Many thanks
I wish you could have a way to turn off the lights on the ac using the app,other then that good app
Easy to setup, easy to use. Great app!
Generally satisfied. Would really appreciate a widget to quickly turn a/c on/off without having to open the app.

Used this with a daison air con and found it to be really unreliable most of the time. Can't recognise if it's on or off, so when you're out for the day, or the weekend or the whole friggin week thinking the air con is off, you discover it's actually on.

Very laggy app. Sometimes I have to press icon many times for it to even react. Running on S10 so phone is not the issue. Also can't select the fan swing direction. * there is no way to manually select your model of air conditioner. Just some silly names at end of Fujitsu that mean nothing to the average user. *no powerful mode *no manual flap control *no low noise mode Alot of features are missed when pairing remote
Easy to use, super nice
The app is fine. It could do with the ability to set up Preset Profiles. And disappointed there isnt a widget.
Amazing
Need the ability to create schedules by a calendar date rather than just time and a specific day of the week

Often won't work. Used to work well.Have three devices. One will not work. One works half of the time. Last one works now but wouldn't work for weeks. Two devices in one home and one device in another. Expensive purchase, not recommended.
Scheduler has a mind of its own. When changing one schedule, often another schedule is deleted and replaced with the changed one. So I end up with two of the same.
Love the app and the simplicity. To fix: Seems two applications in one. When going notifications the application change and there is no ways to go back.
Works great with Google Assistant but definitely needs a widget so I can see the inside temperature at a glance.
It sucks, it makes my life even more difficult
Can't get it to turn off. After using ac remote to.turn off , I can easily get it turned back via my phone. BUT NO OFF. NOT HAPPY.
Needs to have the ability to switch between modes

The software is not great. The scheduler works 2/5 days a week, the timer does not turn the heater/AC on at times. I'm not sure why that's the case. I've reached out to the app developer but they haven't emailed me back.

I already had mine setup correctly. I installed the app on a family member's Android also. But the 2nd version did not work correctly. The menu options are available for installing a new Sensibo unit (new QR code), but not for existing Sensibo unit.

Loved it for a while. Now it doesn't turn off climate control when I leave so my ac keeps turning on for an empty house. If I turn it off it turns right back on. Support button in the app doesn't work either...
It works,. It good! But could be improved. The biggest ommision is that you can't display the currect climate react settings

Does its job, but the UX could use some work. There's a few too many delays where the UI is inactive. Would be nice if several changes could be cued up before actioning them: e.g. set mode from cool to heat and adjust temp by 2 degrees. Right now this requires three separate commands, with a delay between each. Would be nice if the google home voice commands could set mode and temp with one command too, but that's more a service issue than related to this app.

I have read the reviews and I have to say that I also had a challenge that was due to firmware update. I worked with a kind lady by the name of Iris and she worked her tail off trying to figure out a solution. Sensibo ended up having to send me out another unit, but it arrived in less than 2 days and everything worked flawlessly! A big thanks to Iris and Chloe! You ladies are rock stars. I am buying another unit in the morning! FYI- I have Mitsubishi and Fujitsu heat pumps...it works on both of them.
Love it!!!
Good app but the website is better. If you could have the temp logging and the same scheduler, I think it would be significantly better experience.

I have been trying to do the barcode scan and it wont go past that must have been used by someone else and i am locked out of it or something! Cool concept but cant get it set up so useless as of now unless there is a way past previous owner info
This app is quite easy to use. The remote still lacks some features compare to my ac original remote, hope Sensibo update them soon.
Scheduling turns itself off
באופן כללי אפליקציה טובה אבל לא מספיק אמינה. קניתי בשביל יומן שלא עובד טוב. פעם כן מפעיל את המזגן פעם לא, פעם מכבה פעם לא. בשביל מחיר שלו צריך לעבוד פיקס.
I have problem synchronizing remote controller with sensibo sky. I bought set of three pcs and overall it's far from proclaimed 60 sec setup process. Plzz advice..

It does the job but is very sluggish to respond. The transition from the device screen to the controls screen takes a number of taps to get it to respond. Even then it is not clear that tapping the device gets you there. When in the device control screen and selecting the android return takes you out of the app rather than back to the device select screen Basically the app needs a design review and better testing

the device just arrived and i tried it and its working perfectly ,how ever at first the app would not connect to the device automatically , you have to fix it manually by concting your smart phone to the wifi of the device and then connect the device (from your smart phone) to the home wifi if you didnt understand what i have said just google it and you will find the answer to such a situation. over all i like it , you have a full control on your a/c 😁
Not compatible with Bixby for automation. Please make it controllable for bixby routines or bixby voice and I will make it 5 stars.
Latest update broke scheduling for me. It no longer turns my heat pump on and sets the fan to auto, instead only setting the temperature (which does nothing if the heat pump is off).
After the last update of the app, my LG A/C is no longer responding when i need to turn it on....it is only responding on the OFF button
still missing ability to turn on off schedules. the update of August tells you nothing. it works but nothing special in my pov other products will surpass in coming months!

Had to play with it for a bit before I understood this device replaced the old remote and should be pointed at the a/c and the old remote could be put away. Love the scheduling options: this why I bought the device.

Initially had a lot of problems with setup... connecting to WiFi, pairing with remote, etc. They've pushed out a few firmware and software updates in the past week and the issues have been resolved. Additionally, customer support has been responsive and proactive.
Easy, convinient and useful energy saving tool
can't use all functions of my ac

A great product and app. I now have 8 of these devices across 2 properties and they work very well, although sometimes they do disconnect (I think they need a stable power supply). They link to Google Home and IFTTT so it's possible to integrate them into smart automation at home, even without using the app. There's also an un-supported but functional community app available for Hubitat where they work reasonably reliably.
Sensibo is great but not 100% consistent. Also need to make it easier when updating WiFi password.

this device was installed last summer to use during hot days at a maximum of 24c,the air con could be activated using your mobile phone which was great because I could cool my unit 1hour or so before I came home,absolutely wonderful device
very good for me and good work
not all the signals are sent to thr A/C, requires several retries until it sent, and the sensor is facing directly to the A/C. the app itself is very minimal and intuitive
The app is useless on my S10. Touch screen doesn't work most of the times. The mobile site works fine though.

Horrible! Cant even setup the damn thing. My router shows that the device is connected and has an IP address but the app doesnt find it and gets stuck on "waiting for device to connect". I'm going to demand my money back. This is very unprofessional. I tried the manual wifi setup and it still didnt work! edit: changed from one star to four. dev replied and pushed a fix. it's working great now
don't buy it, it's a pain in the neck and doesn't work, stay away
It often "disconnected" when you need it.

I would like the ability to set a desired temperature, then have the device automatically adjust the ac unit temperature up or down to maintain that temp. This would essentially use the sensibo temp sensor instead of the one in the ac unit in order to monitor room temp.
this tool makes my home feel actually smart. thanks team!
Barely updated, UI looks like it's came from the early 2000, huge amount of AC features aren't supported like quiet mode, energy saving mode, etc. only the basic heat, cool, dry and the temp.
Can we get a button to switch on/off the ACs of the whole house?
Works well
now started using and very pleased with the UI

it works. The only thing is that it is not clear how to automatically disable climate react mode in the morning when i leave home and enable in the evening. And why enable/disable button hidden with "+" sign? it is one of the most useful buttons, please add it to the main window
Great app, Sensibo Tech support is amazing response time is less than a day!
very stupid setup
Poor software setup
life changing! 10x
simple to understand. hope would include climate react in scheduling for future update. at the moment unable to switch it off if in climate react mode. TQ
works with all my stuff

Have setup Sensibo before with no issues however I now have a Google Pixel 2XL and was unable to reconfigure WIFI. Does not work at all using app or manual setup. Ended up setting it up off an iphone with zero issues. Once setup works great just need to fix the google pixel compatibility issue with setup.
Perfect
Worthless. Would not work, cannot contact tech support from foreign. location, and Ebay's wants more for return shipping than the unit cost. found unit for 1/10 the price that works fine.
it is the most difficult thing to set up...all it keeps telling me to retry
good stuff

cant get working customer support is like talking to a brick wall through email but they have not called me or gave me any contact information so far so so I guessed customer support is not available through the phone every time I asked if they can call me they don't answer me they just say how they're more than willing to help me but don't solve my problem just going to return the device to Amazon
can't live without
overall the product does what its supposed to do but i would love to see some more functionality, especially controlling both Humidity and Temperature using climate react.
Excellent app. Should have an option to turn the A/C light off.
جيد للتحكم بالمكيف من اي مكان مشكله بعض الاحيان ما يستجيب

I had trouble updating the device firmware using my wifi. Ultimately had to use a 4G hotspot to do it. The process of waiting for a troubleshooting email reply was tedious but at least they replied with help on a daily basis.

it is obvious that this device was returned by a previous customer and had been preconfigured, therefore i cannot connect to it. no reset button. i just read the reviews and it seems like i am not alone. very annoying. do not buy. now i need to waste more time to get my money back.
The functionality is okay, but the app is horrible, it hardly register my touch input. My phone is fine, nothing wrong with my phone's screen.
Pairing didn't work on Honor 10 Had to use an iPhone to the Pairing to Sensibo Sky device. Didn't try again after firmware update.

Quality control and user onboarding require drastic improvement. Took many advanced troubleshooting steps and eventually I just cracked it open and threw product data sheets, a multimeter and a soldering iron at it. Did the trick it seems. If they got through the onboarding issues and general quality control this could be a 4 or 5 star product.

ughhhh, the most frustrating set up process I have ever experience in my life. it does not connect. And trying to, I created a whole mess in my wifi home system. Hourssssss trying and still is not connected, not liking this already.
Terrible functionality. Spent 3 hours trying to connect my Sensibo device but it doesn't work at all
won't download and keeps dropping out
Absolutely useless. You have to enable GPS to let this work otherwise you can't set it up. Account registration does not work and password reset doesn't work either.
wont connect . brand new unit

The setup wizard flat out doesn't work, but at least there is a (buried) doc on how to manually set up the device. Thank god for that being an option. Be prepared to try and train the remote a few times as well. Once you've endured the worst set up experience I've ever seen, the app is capable and does what it says. All I needed was to get it talking to my Google Home though, so that done I'm not going to bother much with it.
So so easy. Up and running in under 5 minutes.

Horrible app, it won't find the device and therefore cannot pair with it. so it needs to be returned. I've never experienced such an awful setup process and a program unable to find something so simple I have over 100 smart devices integrated in my home. This product has been out for quite some time and lacks basic functionality. Save your money buy an rm mini or pro for a 3rd the cost of this paper weight.
does not work with Note 9. poor. I wasted money on nothing.
works great!! can access anywhere
easy and practical, and works with Google assistant. I love that you can schedule it based on external temperature
חייבים להוסיף ווידג'טים, היום אני עשיתי ווידגטים עם ifttt וזה עובד עם דיליי מעצבן

I was told about a year ago that in about a year they would be "lateral" swing control, I don't use "up and down" for my air movement, I only use side to side. So if I start my swing control from original remote to side by side, as soon as I use sensibo for whatever ( 1 degree down) it stops my swing where they are. Very annoying. Is it really that hard to add lateral control? I also think that not much development is happening with this product. Sad because the rest works well for me.

works pretty well so far, design is a tap underwhelming considering it is a pricey piece of hardware. also it would be great if you could access the temperature and humidity log from the app, and set up climate react to operate within timeframes (without location awareness)
i hope next time you integrate it with auto adjust climate , just like ambi climate

Works good, but give an option to activate /deactivate scheduling service. When Hotspot is on since it connect automatically AC starts to run Give an option to disable scheduling and activating when required

Terrible installation process. Issue with wifi on the S9+ Thankfully I had an iPad to set it up, auto climate does not work. Great device if you have an iPhone... Also not getting push notifications. But there is potential if they make the app function as well as apple's version.
Setting climate control during specific hours (i.e only at night) would be very useful.

I've been using Sensibo for a year. I put it in the same place,never changed our wifi, never dropped it. it just suddenly doesn't work. Tried to reset it, it keeps telling me to check my location which I didn't and nothing wrong. I'm now using SS note9. It never found the Sensibo network. so I borrowed my sister's iPhone to set it up. It looks like a hope but it's still doesn't work. and unfortunately my sister is about to leave. The support team send me the support link which doesn't help me.

The Sensibo teams are very helpful, givin support even to including new resources, example my request to send the command to turn off my AC led after every Sensibo's command. A suggestion to the future is to include the history chart in the App, could be the same of the web site.
The services are Great, but the App. needs some improvements, Thanks.

Hardware i have (2 Sensibo Sky) works perfectly and I love it, I like this application but I'm missing direct button to switch on/off climate react - it is possible when you login to sensibo website than I'd like to see same function in android app - either on main screen or in each AC detail. Thank you

Overall system functionality is great. The app doesn't respond to touch very well e.g. you have to press the button three times to get it do an action. My Samsung S8 has no problems with touch responsiveness in other apps, just this one.

Climate react switches the aircon on and off depending on the temperature, so it helps to save electricity. However it os difficult to emable that feature- it cannot be done with location, voice commands, or scheduling.
Do not buy the adapter Bad company No support in the event of a malfunction Waiting a month to get back to me I sent 5 miles No comment Do not buy Caution

just bought the sensibo sky. followed the instruction on the app. plugged in the device - blinking every 2 sec, scanned the qr code, gave permission for location. same as the other user, I am getting the "could not find sensibo device network". Seems like this is a common issue, it would be good if the fix is easily searchable on the net or just post the solution here instead of replying to contact support. I was able to set it up with an older phone. seems like the app does not work with note 9
A widget would be really helpful.

Most of the time climate react doesn't trigger after exceeding or going below preset temperature. Please fix the issue. Also please add the function to select the temperature in half incremental (e.g 24.5c or 25.5c)
phone location on, sensibo blinking once every 2 seconds, Can't find network. have tried 20 times 👎Samsung S9+
Amazing device and great functionality. But wish I could schedule turning climate react on/off just like location awareness instead of just AC on/off.
Best product of its type out there. Amazing customer service as well. Thank you Sensibo!!

The device is great, as is the climate react function. My only gripes are: 1) in the most recent update, if climate react is active in a room this doesn't show up on the home screen (it used to); 2) having two climate reacts per room would be very handy as sometimes in our location we need to be able to heat and cool rooms in the same 24hr period (as it might cool down dramatically at night but be hot during the day); and 3) enabling climate react in 0.5deg increments would be helpful.
location data on. sensibo blinking once, phone can see network. setup? failed!
excellent product
good product. would be nice if they added the ability to turn the led display on the a/c on/off

From my short experience seems to be a great product. Just one issue that Ive seen almost immediately, when I use the AC remote with the sensibo app is open, the sensibo app doesn't update the state, after closing and reopening the app, the state is updated - just an irritating bug.
DO NOT BUY IF OUTSIDE NORTH AMERICA — Server, and hence your app and voice control etc., reset every air-conditioner to Fahrenheit every week or two.
i now have access to tempeture and humidity data and i can control heating and ac remotely. Fantastic app!
Not bad. will give 5 stars if the app comes with widgets
Great app for a great device, but please add widgets and Wear OS support for 5 stars.
great app and product. you know what would make it amazing. a widget that shows temp at the top of the phone and a graph of temp readings over the course of the day
good app and device to control the AC. now waiting for enhanced AI capabilities

It doesn't always shut off/come on when I turn it off/on via the app. Sometimes I have to turn it on/off almost a half dozen times before it works. I am within the range that Sensibo says I should be as well. Also some of the timers I have set but turned off as of late they still come on regardless of them being switched off. It's far from perfect, that's for sure. When it works, it's pretty cool. I just never know if it's actually on/off when I'm not home.

Overall quite useful as a concept, but it needs better IFTTT integrations (doesn't support timers). I'd like to be able to click a widget before bed that will turn on my aircon and turn it off two hours later - there is a climate react mode but this doesnt meet my needs. It honestly doesnt feel like there is much active development going on with this app - I've had a sensibo for over a year and not much has changed. Don't expect this product to evolve quickly to meet your needs.
Great but is there a desk top version,  Was looking at retro fitting to a school with multiple AC units throughout the campus

It was painful to setup, had to reset, reregister then repeat to finally get connected. It would also be nice if the connection screen mentions that it only works on 2.4GHz WiFi network. The vane configuration doesn't work with my heat pump.

Wish they have a toggle in the Schedule time to select ALL to turn on or off, without this feature I have to scroll one by one and shut on or off going thru over 20 different time scheduled. Hope they push a update for this... besides I highly recommend Sensibo the best so far.

Great idea but this app is unfortunately garbage. The app and the air con controller don't know what each other are doing. So if the air con is turned on by the remote control then the app still thinks the air con is off. The whole point of the app is so that you can turn your system on before you get home. But the app cannot accurately tell you if the system is a lready on or not so you have no way of knowing if you're actualy turning it off instead of on. Fail.

Once the update happens the App goes into a downward spiral. It struggles to connect. When I go onto the app it say disconnected yet everything is on...? I have to switch it on and of or try later it is really frustrating me!!!! Can someone please assist me.

The app needs great improvement! The device setup is painful, it often cannot join the device 's wifi and manual steps need to be taken. However, my another setup failed because i reset the device and app just pretends that it is still registered.. I hope someone can hack the protocol so I can write the app myself 😤
Simply brilliant!
חסר מצב של טורבו במזגן, חסר מצב של שינוי טמפרטורה ללא הדלקת המזגן.

The device itself is great. Easy setup with my Mitsubishi minisplit, and works from 20' away in direct line of sight. The Android app has some rough edges, but works ok for basic remote control and setting up the unit to turn on/off on a schedule. I was hoping it was a more full-featured thermostat, but it's basically just a web-enabled remote control plus temperature sensor.

Ever since the app was updated it is not working as it should. I love sensibo but now it takes 4 times of pressing the on/off before activates or deactivates the air conditioner. A very disappointed as I love this product. Not working with Google home either.
Addition of vertical swing control expanded view is a big improvement but it would be even better it horizontal swing could also be controlled from the app.
I ordered Sensibo sky and it didnt work wel with wi fi, it was constantly disconnecting from wi fi network after I excange some emails with CS they send me new and it works great. I do recommend!

Best app ever. I've been using it for many months now and have never had a single problem. The app is responsive and the design is great, it's well laid out and easy to use. Works perfectly with my Google Home too. I would highly recommend this to anyone.

Only provides a subset of control that the AC's remote provides and it varies by unit. E.g. it doesn't operate the shutter swing on one of my three AC units, which is irritating. Forget thing like turning off the AC display - which for a bedroom AC unit can be the difference between it being a useful device or not - I make a change to the settings via Sensibo, AC display comes on, lights up the whole room and I have to get out of bed and retrieve the genuine remote so I can turn the AC display back off.

Love my new Sensibo Sky's! Took about 5 minutes to setup end to end and now have completely connected aircons! App is easy to use and nicely built, have had no issues yet. Nothing is perfect so my suggestion would be to add a % meter when its doing the firmware updates. Currently just has a spinning circle which gives you no indication its progressing or working. Sharing feature is great, have easily synchronized my wife and my account with our aircons. Would be good if you could customise notifications and alerts for state changes, say if my wife turns aircon on, it notifies me (but i can turn off if i want or silence).
Great App and product! It will be good to be about to schedule when the time that Climate React module can be turned off.

Great, awesome idea and a less-than-ideal implementation. Out of the box it managed to identify the remotes for both of my portable A/C's... only to find out that one of them does not work at all (just sent a support ticket, hopefully it gets corrected), and the other only supports half the functions. I understand that there are 1000s models around the world. I heard that their support is excellent. What I don't understand is why not to implement a GENERIC learning mode and let users program Sensibo for their units? Sensibo can then collect the data and extend functionality this way. This will ease the load on the support team a lot.

Very good app and it works as it should be except that i am having a hard time pressing the buttons, I don't know what's the reason, sometimes they are not responsive and i need to press several times. Also it would be great if you add widgets...
Its a great app. Just missing a simple on /off widget so i dont have to open the app everytime.
Had a minor issue with the swing option after the latest update but customer service fixed it in a few minutes! This is one cool app and I highly recommend their support team.
Works as advertised. I did have a slight issue finding my remote code, but my unit itself is sort of a custom model (ptac unit). Works great with Google Assistant
Great idea, very useful, but the app can use some sprucing up. In addition, please add a widget for the home screen so people don't have to go through the app to turn the ac on/off.

This app is really good for the companion device. Really impressed with the sensibo device and will buy more. It is the best climate ccontrol that i have used so far. For difficult remotes you may have to log into the website and choose manufacturer.

I was expecting much more from this app. The device is ok and works good but the app and software needs a lot more work. It feels like it's in early beta. Statistics are missing (like amount of time the AC was on or cooling/heating etc, estimated power consumption etc). Missing ability to control all the devices at once in a house (and not each AC individually). "Climate react" only works in 1 degree increments and is very limited (only 2 states of the AC can be set, like heat and cool or cool and off or dry and off, it's kind of useless this way). "Climate React" is missing from scheduler and would be a lot more useful instead of just on/off. Scheduler is kind of basic, the list of scheduled events should be grouped by room and should provide more info like the settings of the AC. I can't tell how schedule, location awareness and climate react work together and which of them has precedence over the other. There are other bugs like sometimes needing manual refresh to update status.

The setup of WiFi was not perfect. And there should be some trendfunction, 
daily and weekly trend of actual temp/humidity vs setpoint. This would be 
helpfull to setup a good schedule. With trends it will Get higher rating😊
Amazingly good

WOAW - I had low expectations for such a wide machines compatibility. After a hectic remote learning I was pleased to see a lot of functions appearing on my app. It works just GREAT! I has never bugged in a week. Records almost all changes made with the remote which is awesome. I strongly recommend it! I am very pleased with it!

This is a great product. I have one suggestion: make a widget that shows 
temperature and humidity, so we can easily access that information on home 
screen.

The app needs a little improvement. The scheduler should be per ac. Add 
scheduler options like turn on for 10 minutes every hour with in a time 
span. I found my self needing to sync the ac state many times, perhaps you 
can move it as a button of the ac instead of going to the settings. Thanks!

Easy to use. Good instructions to get the device installed and working, had 
it all up and running in minutes. Tested the basic on/off function and the 
scheduling functions, no issues all works exactly as i want it to.

A few days after purchase it forgot how to switch between heat / AC / fan 
and that feature hasn't worked since. Support has been useless, incessantly 
insisting that the problem is the unit isn't connected to wifi even though 
they can see in their server logs that I can switch the power on and off.

Poorly designed app: you select Scheduling from a specific ac's menu and it 
asks which ac you want to set the scheduling for; you log into the app, 
select Set Up Climate React and you're presented with a new login prompt; 
if you increase the Android's font size some screens' layouts is messed up. 
The overall usability looks poorly thought.

Amazing! My heat pump has a new lease of life! I can now come home to a 
warm house every day!

Great app, very ease of use which is what I like to see in products. My 
only recommendations are to maybe add names for schedules, a way to remove 
options (that a device doesn't have and there for is pointless displaying 
them) and a way to set default devices as I only manage my one split 
system. Other than that, this product has was a must buy when I saw it and 
low and behold, within an hour I was in the car to the shops buying one. As 
the ad says, it's very easy to setup and most of all, it's smart assistant 
compatible which was half the reason for buying this product.

Overall, this is a useful app. There are some issues. The location awareness setup is very difficult to complete because it's buggy and crashy. Also, why do I need to point the remote at the device and push a button? Why can't I just type in my model of AC? Because of this I had to spend an hour poring over obscure construction contractor parts ordering websites to find my model of remote, then order a remote I'll only use once and then wait several weeks for it to arrive before I could finish setup...

Location awareness does not work at all. Remote control works properly, it 
is frustrating to be 25 miles from home, and i have to shut the unit off 
manually. Kind of defeats the entire purpose.

The sorting think of the devices does not work. Only fan control for my 
Daikin a/cs. Still need batteries at last one a year.

Location Awareness is not working properly.. if not, at all. This is one of 
the main reason i took Sensibo. It's disappointing that one of the main 
feature doesn't work at all. Need to fix that asap

Location awareness does not work in practice. Plus minimum range is 500m, 
so even if it did work, where I live that's quite a big distance! Interface 
is unintuitive, relying on iconography when there is plenty of space for 
additional text. Settings like fan speed are hidden rather than easily 
tapped. Remote A/C is a god send though!

Used to work fine. Now my device keeps saying Disconnected and I have to 
remove and add it frequently. The support I get from Sensibo is exactly 
that as well. To reset everything.

Cancel that drag down to update, its terrible and annoying af! Its keeps 
doing that instead of pushing the button

Great app. Only thing missing is widget support. I need a single click to 
start/stop my A/C.

Overall great. If you ever run into trouble just let them know. The 
customer service is excellent! Climate react is great. Would be even better 
with some more options like scheduling the climate react and more react 
points. Like below, between and above.
good app and device,love the schedule timer.take full charge of the aircon
Suddenly cant work with Google Home,  it states that it paired in the Google Home app but it doesn't appear in the list of paired services

I have the Sensibo sky. I set it up without ever being prompted for accounts. It worked for a short while. Now it asks me to make an account, I did. My Sensibo is no longer connected to my phone but I cannot connect the same device. It keeps asking me to "use the app to share the device with others."   I'm afraid to ask CS for help as the last time I detailed my problem and told them that the prompts varied from the guide, I was told to follow the guide. What a disgraceful response.  I really wanted to like this product but it is a product that I wouldn't even put through alpha testing let alone sell it.
Needs more control over specific mini splits. More intuitive way to change temp. Not 1 degree at a time. Which is frustrating. And option to offset temp read out which is not accurate on my system.
Great concept! However sometimes the schedules actions don't work. It happened to me twice these last days. Any pb with the servers?

It needs more Google Home Commands  Should allow voice commands for setting AC timers as well as finally rolling out the Climate React feature (which has been in beta for a while now)  Other voice commands, like toggling the louvers, setting AC modes should also be supported.

It crashes when trying to connect the device to the WiFi network. Customer support was not able to fix the issue, but they were able to provide a workaround which worked perfectly.  The app isn't perfect. The design of screens and settings could use a little more care, but the functionality is great. It works *nearly* perfectly out of the box. Only swing direction didn't work quite right, and it didn't have my unit's "AI Mode" available
That is the coolest app ever!!!

Great concept and execution - works (nearly) as intended. While the first time the location trigger ("on" when within 500M) worked, it has since stopped working. I would really appreciate support on this.
Works ok, but very unresponsive to touch. Can't find server today so doesn't work! Can't it be managed without a server? Straight from phone to Sensibo?
This is truly the worst device I've ever had to try and set up. Nothing works
The app is slow to respond and once you create a scheduled change you can't modify AM/PM.  Simple stuff that should just work and it doesn't.

I would like more options in ifttt support. Eg if temperature above...  And if the next model would have a microphone, you could hear if the AC/heater received the command from the sensibo unit. But great device in total. Good support.

Great little app and works with Google home. I have found one bug with the timer function. I have to set it for an extra hour every time eg. If I want a timer for two hours I need to set it for three.
Great, only problem is that you can't have automatic temperature control on schedule
Works great.
Great device, but the location does not register on android 6. Please fix for 5 stars. I am using the latest version, 196 and still doesn't work
An update on Christmas day! I don't know if it's any better but I like the dedication! Let's hope better Google assistant in the future now that google released assistant API
Brilliant, my house is cool when I get home. Sensibo kicks it off just before I get there.
First day today, so far, absolutely awesome 👍🏻 Thank you
Works AMAZING! No lag at all. It's instant! Controls everything including luvours. Best Thermostat app for the Sensibo Carrier Puck (Split AC Ductless MAQB)
Excellent product all works as advertised
Very unreliable product that fails to work more often than operate correctly.  Device needs power cycling every other day before app commands have effect...
Does it support heat and cool AC ? Like my AC has heating option too can I control heater also ?
Location awareness dosent work, this device is a joke. I contacted support , they said the problem fixed but it dosent... so annoying

Update 2: Sensibo sky. Reliability has gone. First 3 months were excellent. Then one day, it stopped reliably receiving commands. Reboots change nothing. Then 2 hours later, all is fine. What's going on? Update: There is a bug in the app. If you have multiple schedules set up and you edit one that is not the last on the list, it overwrites all subsequent schedules with the info you just added so you end up with multiple copies of the same schedule item. Please fix and i'll change back to 5 stars. Original: It took 2 mins to set up with the new sensibo sky...very slick! It works flawlessly with my fujitsu heatpump. It has all of the options which are on the remote, modes, fan speeds, swing. Scheduling is a breeze. Very impressed!
Location awaness is not working as expected. Not like the way iOS APP work.
It works great for me. You only need to update android app for a better touch support.

Tried hard to love the product... But it's so unreliable, the hub keep disconnected from network and have to restart it all the time... Sensibo solution was to use a smart plug!! Found similar products on eBay for 20$(or less) doing the job... I know it might stop working sooner than sensibo, but hey it's a fraction of the price and when it's writing, it's working... *** Sorry Google Play doesn't support reply so have to do it like this*** Thanks sensibo team for offering to switch to the new generation, but I really don't want to spend another 500$ or so to upgrade my pods, specially when I bought them even before the promotions
Inherent bug where the sensibo unit will disconnect from the network whenever my phone is connected to the same network.. Very disappointing after buying the device at such premium.
Buy
Love my sensibo. Great to turn on the aircon before I get home and walk into a cooled house.
Great service with very responsive team and a lot of points of integration. Also priced very reasonably. I have one for each of my units and am very satisfied.

No horisontial control which means the AC defaults to blowing all air to the left which in turn means just blowing  into another walk and not spreading cool/heated air at all. Kinda useless for me.  Other than that app and controller does what it promises
I love it , I would give it 5 stars if there is way to turn on AC when temperatures reach certain degree

Love the app and all but the only thing I wish they would do is that it refreshes the current status of the AC. I got 2 people using the app. Let's say one person logs in and turns it on. I log in later and it displayed off instead of on . So I tap it and think I just turned it on but in reality I just turned it off. Is their a way to get the app to refresh and display the current status of the AC? Thanks
Integrated well with Alexa
Good product and app. Please make the AC state sync button more approachable.

Really appreciate that they have regular updates to make this all even greater. Some good features in there. Would like to have the opportunity to tweak the current temperature display. Seems to be off by at least 1C, probably a thermometer issue in the device but if I had the opportunity to adjust the display temperature it would be good. Adding new icons could be a good thing as well. Keep up updating this app. Much appreciated.
The product is good and works flawless, but the integration with Google Home is a little frustrating, too long commands on Google Home just to turn on/off.

LOVE IT! However, unable to Link to Google Home... The Instructions Online are not accurate. It says Open Setting...Go To More Settings...then Assistant Apps...then look for Smart AC...but they don't have Assistant Apps as an Option nor do they have Smart AC as an Option in the Devices list anyways...
A very well made on boarding experience
great app
Hoping the flap control can be included for my Hitachi AC

12-Dec-16 I received the Home Kit via $53 fast shipping. Initial setup a bit trying but customer service worked diligently to have have all 3 pods working. As of 5-Jan-17, my 3rd pod is working fine. I will recommend this to a friend. A minor bug prevented me from changing the icon on my kitchen pod. A 5 star if fixed!
This took longer to unbox than it did to setup. Worked flawless using UDH7/9 Fujitsu heads

I'm using Sensibo since they launched at Indiegogo. Both my wife and myself are using the app and it works great. We had a pleasant surprise twice to receive a replacement battery  via mail. The only issue that you must find a resolution to is syncing with the old remote or the AC when turned on/off not via the app. It's always weird to see it's still on in the app when someone in the house turned it off manually.
I wish the icons for the AC being on vs off weren't so similar. Red versus green instead of different shades of blue would be much more helpful.
Latest updates are making this a much better product. Keep it up

Getting Really frustrating new version out 1.0.117 and it just crashes when selecting certain pods and you can't remove the pods and try and reinstall them,  stop pushing out unstable product releases

Every week it seems there's a new 'upgrade' that fixes most of the issues created by the previous 'upgrade' while creating a set of whole new issues!!!! Don't touch it yet. They're not even close to getting it right.

Awesome product great app.  Turns on when I tell it and turns off when I tell it to.  You can even go to the Web browser and it will sense vibration if you don't trust the app.  Very easy to install and customer support is excellent.  *****
Why am I still stuck in Celsius?
Worst . pls reply me
The app works, flows well and is useful.the schedule is amazing. However there are enough bugs that are incredibly annoying, such as app being frozen on load from background.
I love my sensibo, together with IF it a life changing product.
מוצר זבל חבל על על שקל או דולר

Very limited features and functionality. Most of the promised campaign features were never developed. Outrageous price for additional pod if you ever want to expand to more A/Cs.  Hardware keeps having to be reset :(
No support for Android 6.0
Scheduling made this app a 5* one!  IFTTT integration is nice as well.
Works most of the time. Sometimes it will not send the commands properly, for example temperature change or turn off. Even if it says it was successful.

I erased by mistake my previous review.  Basically it won't install on a tablet (Nexus 7 Android 5.1.1), Short range of the pod forcing non-optimal location, flimsy build of battery contacts and complete lack of automation and/or scheduling features so IFTTT is a must. Nice concept but the product completely failed for me as it's also unable to determine if the AC is actually switched on.
Great app and product!

I have no idea if this app is good or bad. I received my first hub and two pods after an expected lengthy wait only to find the hub didn't work. Numerous emails later it was agreed a replacement would be sent. Three weeks later, I received another faulty hub. It took nearly a week for someone to answer my emails about the fault with the replacement hub. I have asked for a refund as I believe this product is below standard and the customer service is bordering on a very poor joke. STILL NO REPLY!!

Very easy setup and controls my mini split perfectly. Such a great purchase. I was feeling left out of the IoT given that the Nest only works with wired thermostats. Not anymore. My AC now works in my schedule!
This is the life in 2015. Controlling the air  conditioning without getting up in the middle of work (air conditioner controller not in my office). Why didn't I get this sooner?
Great support from the dev team despite minor technical issues. The product works well and look forward to more functionalities in the near future.
Had an issue with unblock us service that was blocked,  and after a few days the issue got resolved by the dev team
Lots of room for improvement,  but it's a great start.
.no more looking for the remote, show temp and humi, anywhere in the world control, actually working two Indoors with ine sensibo,  wish to have more options as schedule, swipe,
Please add ability to customize controlls, not being able to detect some models makes sensibo useless
Thanks Sensibo
Recommended!

Just finished setting up Sensibo, everything works but could be better. The app crashed a few times on my phone in the middle of configuration and there I could find no way of returning to earlier points on the setup (like recalibrating the remote, renaming the pods and probably one or two that I can't recall right now). All in all the experience is great and the direction you've taken with setup is quite intuitive. I'd like to see more configurable settings in the app (as the ones I've mentioned)
I am also missing more of  the what if scenarios for android
Only wish i could access the ACs more advanced controls via the app and sensibo's IFTTT or other triggering services were smarter. For example : im returning home & temp is high - turn AC on
Love it. Setting up was a breeze and lo and behold, even my antique AC unit works like magic after a single click of the remote. It's cool again.
App is excellent
Cool article I read but haven't used the app
